list.name: Changes
list.comment:
chore(repo): initialize Turborepo monorepo structure and tooling
This foundational commit scaffolds the entire SofIA project as a Turborepo monorepo, establishing the core structure and developer experience tooling.
- Initializes a pnpm workspace managed by Turborepo. - Creates the standard `apps` and `packages` directory structure. - Sets up the Next.js `frontend` application. - Sets up the FastAPI `backend` application with a Poetry bridge. - Configures monorepo-wide Prettier.

task.summary:
chore: add pre-commit hooks for code quality and conventional commits
- Added pre-commit-hooks for basic code quality checks - Added conventional-pre-commit hook to enforce conventional commit messages - This will help maintain consistent code quality and commit history

chore: update .gitignore with PyCharm-specific patterns
- Added JetBrains/PyCharm specific ignore patterns
